usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo Black (900) for Hero titles, Bold (700) for Section headers. Tracking-tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: IBM Plex Sans for all paragraphs. Leading-relaxed.
usage_rules.data: Use JetBrains Mono for API keys, hash values, and code snippets.

dashboard.card_style: Rounded-lg (not xl), dense padding (p-4 or p-5)

buttons.primary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white font-medium transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: h-10 px-6 rounded-md bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 text-white border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 p-8 hover:border-indigo-500/30 transition-colors
cards.stat: rounded-lg bg-[#121212] border border-white/5 p-4 flex flex-col justify-between

inputs.style: bg-[#050505] border-white/10 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500 rounded-md h-10

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (opacity 80%)

charts_and_maps.3d_usage: Use React Globe GL on the Dashboard to visualize active client nodes across the world. Points should pulse.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT DARK MODE BY DEFAULT. Do not create a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked. The brand is 'Cyber-Security'.
2. Use the 'High Density Grid' for the Dashboard. It should feel like a cockpit.

3. For the 'Federated Learning' visualization, create a custom component using Recharts or simple CSS animations showing data packets moving from 'Client Nodes' to the 'Central Model' without revealing raw data.
4. The 'Client Script' download page must look like a developer documentation page (JetBrains Mono font, code blocks).
5. Use 'sonner' for all notifications (e.g., 'Model Updated', 'Client Connected').
6. Ensure all API keys are masked by default with a 'Show' toggle.
7. The Landing Page must use the 'Bento Grid' layout to showcase features.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients on text.
Do not center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements must include data-testid.
